protein.general_function: Involved in cAMP-dependent protein kinase regulator activity
protein.specific_function: Type II regulatory chains mediate membrane association by binding to anchoring proteins, including the MAP2 kinase

go_class.description: regulation of cellular protein metabolic process
regulation of protein amino acid phosphorylation
